import React, { useState } from "react"; import styles from "./InvestmentForm.module.css"; const InvestmentForm = () => { const [enteredCurrentSaving, setEnteredCurrentSaving] = useState(0); const [enteredYearlySaving, setEnteredYearlySaving] = useState(0); const [enteredExpectedInterest, setEnteredExpectedInterest] = useState(0); const [enteredInvestDuration, setEnteredInvestDuration] = useState(0); return (

); }; export default InvestmentForm;
